text: Stefan Demert (15 December 1939 – 9 July 2018) was a Swedish singer-songwriter and musician. Demert was born in Nyköping. His best-known songs include ”Balladen om den kaxiga myran”, ”Till SJ”, and ”Anna Anaconda” Several of his songs charted on Svensktoppen in the 1970s. Demert died on 9 July 2018 in Kungsbacka, Sweden, aged 78. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Swedish singer-songwriters Category:Swedish musicians
title: Stefan Demert
